ComicInfo.Series: Anita Blake, Vampire Hunter: The Laughing Corpse - Necromancer
ComicInfo.Summary:
BEST-SELLING AUTHOR LAURELL K. HAMILTON’S THRILLER CONTINUES! Anita Blake has a problem: the one woman who could answer all of her questions about millionaire Harold Gaynor’s mysterious past isn’t talking. The vampire hunter—who’s been hunted and attacked by this self-made tycoon—wants the woman named Wheelchair Wanda to sing like a canary, and she’s not above causing a little hurt to make it happen. Sometimes even the good guys have to get dirty…
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/anita-blake-vampire-hunter-the-laughing-corpse-nec/4000-168293/
